name: Gravi-Verse (0.40)
description:
Welcome to Gravi-Verse, an all-new versatile platformer where you traverse the universe in search of power to change the past! This game is filled with action, adventure, and more! This game works on just about every desktop device, and it has gamepad support.

- Gather items and weapons to assist you on your journey.

- Fight dangerous foes on epic landscapes.

- Discover new platforming styles and fight tough bosses.

- Use amazing suits and use your head to solve platforming puzzles.

This game is still in development, but so far there are 3 planets completed! If you want more, show me your support and I'll make it happen. :)

Suggestions and feedback are greatly appreciated. I've worked very hard on this game, so please let me know where I can improve.
